title: Rising price level increases money demand

content.question: Which of the following shifts the money demand curve to the right?

choices.label: An increase in the price level
A decrease in the price level
A decrease in the nominal gross domestic product

content.answer: An increase in the price level

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
